divs: sighting detailsthree of us, having a christmas cheer sited 2 object arrising out of the s.e. at first we thought aircraft taking off from biship airport in flint. no landing lights only bright red\orange solid glowing light. they rose up heading slowly toward the n.e. and toward us. after attaining an elevation of about 1\4 mile we estimate, 3 more identical colored globes appeared, suddently dropping out from above the cloud cover, which was present. we could not see any stars throught the cover. we observed hovering, straight line movement, and seperation of the craft. angle degrees changes. then 3 of them moved off quickly to the west, s.w. the other two lingered around and slowly moved to the west in front of us, dimming out as they eventually went through the cloud cover. the whole event took about 20 minutes and ended about 6:50 pm. 1. nichols rd. just north of farrand rd. 2. came out of the garage and saw in the s.e. horizon. easy as there was no other lights in the sky. 3. airplanes\helicopters taking off from biship airport in flint, mi. 4. first 2 appeared to arise out of the s.e. very bright red\orange light globe in appearance.. while watching them, 3 more dropped out of the cloud cover and jointed them. the 3 seemed to stay together and left together. the first 2 stayed together and left together after the 3 left, about 5 minutes later. 5. speechless. no rational explaination. anxious. 6. 3 quickly moved to the west and out of site., 2 took their time and 1 at a time, dimmed out as they move to the west, s.w.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Montrose
There were no other sightings in Montrose on or around December 25th 2012
Summary: 3 of us. observed christmas night 6:20-7pm. 2 orbs/lights then 3 more appeared. Unidentifiable. Unexplained.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
